projects.name: ChatBot for Medical Support
projects.description: Designed and developed a user-friendly healthcare chatbot leveraging advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and natural language processing. The chatbot provides personalized medical guidance and support, offering instant access to reliable health information, symptom assessment, and assistance in scheduling doctor appointments.

projects.name: Bank Data Analysis
projects.description: Spearheaded a comprehensive data analysis project for a leading bank, leveraging advanced analytics and machine learning techniques to drive business growth and improve operational efficiency. Successfully analyzed large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights that informed strategic business decisions. Additionally, developed and implemented a customer segmentation framework that enabled personalized marketing and improved customer service.

experiences.description: Demonstrated expertise in Salesforce by earning Super Badges in Apex Specialist, Process Automation Specialist, and Developer Super Set. Acquired knowledge and skills in Salesforce Fundamentals, Organizational Setup, Relationship and Process Automation, Types of Flows and Security, Apex, Testing and Debugging, VS Code Setup and CLI Setup, and Lightning Web Components (LWC) and API.

Contributed to the development of multiple projects using Python, including data analysis, machine learning, and web development. Collaborated with senior developers to test new features for existing projects and gained hands-on experience with popular Python libraries and frameworks, such as NumPy, Pandas, and Flask.
